form.label: Agent Logins
form.description: View statistics and summaries for Agent login sessions

search.query: `default_index` | lookup host_lookup.csv host OUTPUT hostname | eval officeNames = if(isnull(hostname),host,hostname) | dedup officeNames | table host, officeNames | sort + host
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $o_name$ | eval fqname = q_name+" ("+q_num+")" | dedup q_name | dedup q_num | table fqname, q_name, q_num | sort + q_name
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $o_name$ $queue_field$ | eval AgentE = ag_fname + " " + ag_lname + " (Ext."+ag_num+")" | dedup AgentE | table AgentE, ag_num | sort + AgentE

panel.title: Average Time Spent Logged in per Queue

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | eval mins = round(secondsloggedin/60,3) | join q_num [search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $o_name$ | dedup q_name | table q_name, q_num] | stats avg(mins) as "Avg Time" by q_name | rename q_name as Queue | sort - "Avg Time"

panel.title: Top/Bottom 10 Agents with total Queue Time

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | where ag_num!="1000" | eval secondsloggedin = secondsloggedin/3600 | eval Agent = ag_fname + " " + ag_lname | stats sum(secondsloggedin) as Time by Agent | eval Time=round(Time,2) | sort $sort_sign$ Time | rename Time AS "Hours " | head 10

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | eval Agent = ag_fname + " " + ag_lname + " ("+ag_num+")" | join q_num [search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $o_name$ | dedup q_name | table q_name, q_num] | eval qq = q_name+" ("+q_num+")"
| stats values(q_num) as Qlist, dc(logouttime) as logins, avg(secondsloggedin) as AvgTLIn, latest(logouttime) as lastactive, sum(secondsloggedin) as TotTLIn values(qq) as Queues by Agent
| eval ToLIn = tostring(TotTLIn,"duration") | rex field=ToLIn "(?<dayAndHours>.*)\:(?<mins>\d+)\:(?<secs>\d+)" | eval TTot1 = "("+replace(dayAndHours,"\+","d ")+"h "+mins+"m "+secs+"s )" | eval ToLIn = round(TotTLIn/3600,2) | eval ToLIn = ToLIn+" hours "+TTot1 | eval ToTLIn = tostring(AvgTLIn,"duration") | rex field=ToTLIn "(?<dayAndHours2>.*)\:(?<mins2>\d+)\:(?<secs2>\d+)" | eval TAvg1 = "("+replace(dayAndHours2,"\+","d ")+"h "+mins2+"m "+secs2+"s )" | eval ToTLIn = round(AvgTLIn/3600,2) | eval ToTLIn = ToTLIn+" hours "+TAvg1
| eval lastactive = strftime(strptime(lastactive,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z"),"%a %I:%M %p %z, %b %d %Y")
| table Agent, Queues, lastactive, logins, ToLIn, ToTLIn | join Agent [search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" | eval Agent = ag_fname + " " + ag_lname + " ("+to_dn+")" | eval svc = if(isserviced=1,1,0) | stats sum(svc) as "Calls Serviced" by Agent ] | rename ToLIn as "Total Time Spent Logged In", ToTLIn as "Avg Time Spent Logged In", logins as "# of Logins", lastactive as "Last Time Active"

panel.title: Average Time Spent Logged into Queue

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | where ag_num!="1000" | eval Agent = ag_fname + " " + ag_lname | eval tHours = secondsloggedin/3600 | stats avg(tHours) AS agg BY Agent | eval agg = round(agg,2) | sort $srtavg$ agg | head 10 | rename agg as "Average Hours"

input.label: RECOMMENDED: Use Time Range or Time/Date Range. Defaults to previous day.

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | where ag_num!="1000" | eval Agent = ag_fname + " " + ag_lname | eval loginTime = strptime(logintime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z") | eval logoutTime = strptime(logouttime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z") | eval sTime = strptime(logintime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z") | eval dur = secondsloggedin*1000 | stats count by sTime, dur, Agent | table sTime Agent dur

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | eval loginTime = strptime(logintime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z") | eval logoutTime = strptime(logouttime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z") | eval Agent = ag_fname + " " + ag_lname | sort + loginTime | eval LoginTime = strftime(strptime(logintime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z"),"%b %d, %Y %I:%M %p") | eval LogoutTime = strftime(strptime(logouttime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z"),"%b %d, %Y %I:%M %p") | join q_num [search sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $o_name$ | dedup q_name | table q_name, q_num] | eval qq = q_name+" ("+q_num+")" | stats values(qq) as qq by LogoutTime, ag_num, LoginTime, Agent | sort - LogoutTime | rename qq AS "Queue(s)", ag_num AS Extension, LoginTime AS "Time of Login", LogoutTime AS "Logged out at" | Table "Time of Login", Agent, Extension, "Queue(s)","Logged out at"
